metadata.name: The Pillz NFT
metadata.description:
The Pillz NFT is an NFT claimable for a device and a unique playable NFT character from Cellz game.

To redeem go to pillz.tech/claim.
Upon redemption, the NFT is permanently destroyed.

The Pillz is a wearable device for NFTs and phygital pets.
More at https://pillz.tech
